verses.verse: And <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> there <S%H6965>arose<s%> to <S%H3467>defend<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8439>Tola<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6312>Puah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1734>Dodo<s%>, a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar<s%>; and he <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H8069>Shamir<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>.
And he <S%H8199>judged<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>, and <S%H4191>died<s%>, and was <S%H6912>buried<s%> in <S%H8069>Shamir<s%>.

And he had <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> that <S%H7392>rode<s%> on <S%H7970>thirty<s%> ass <S%H5895>colts<s%>, and they had <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>, which are <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H2334>Havoth-jair<s%> unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>, which are in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>.

¶ And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H1168>Baalim<s%>, and <S%H6252>Ashtaroth<s%>, and the <S%H430>gods<s%> of <S%H758>Syria<s%>, and the <S%H430>gods<s%> of <S%H6721>Zidon<s%>, and the <S%H430>gods<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, and the <S%H430>gods<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%>, and the <S%H430>gods<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>, and <S%H5800>forsook<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and <S%H5647>served<s%> not him.

And the <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was <S%H2734>hot<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and he <S%H4376>sold<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>, and into the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%>.

And that <S%H8141>year<s%> they <S%H7492>vexed<s%> and <S%H7533>oppressed<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: <S%H8083%H6240>eighteen<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>, all the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> that were on the other <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, which is in <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>.

Moreover the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> passed <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> also against <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and against <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>, and against the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>; so that <S%H3478>Israel<s%> was <S%H3966>sore<s%> <S%H3334>distressed<s%>.

¶ And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2199>cried<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, We have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against thee, both because we have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>, and also <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H1168>Baalim<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, Did not I deliver you from the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%>, and from the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, from the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%>, and from the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>?

The <S%H6722>Zidonians<s%> also, and the <S%H6002>Amalekites<s%>, and the <S%H4584>Maonites<s%>, did <S%H3905>oppress<s%> you; and ye <S%H6817>cried<s%> to me, and I <S%H3467>delivered<s%> you out of their <S%H3027>hand<s%>.
Yet ye have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> me, and <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>: wherefore I will <S%H3467>deliver<s%> you no <S%H3254>more<s%>.

<S%H3212>Go<s%> and <S%H2199>cry<s%> unto the <S%H430>gods<s%> which ye have <S%H977>chosen<s%>; let <S%H1992>them<s%> <S%H3467>deliver<s%> you in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of your <S%H6869>tribulation<s%>.

¶ And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, We have <S%H2398>sinned<s%>: <S%H6213>do<s%> thou unto us whatsoever <S%H5869>seemeth<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> unto thee; <S%H5337>deliver<s%> us only, we pray thee, this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

And they put <S%H5493>away<s%> the <S%H5236>strange<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> them, and <S%H5647>served<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: and his <S%H5315>soul<s%> was <S%H7114>grieved<s%> for the <S%H5999>misery<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

Then the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> were gathered <S%H6817>together<s%>, and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>. And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> assembled themselves <S%H622>together<s%>, and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H4709>Mizpeh<s%>.

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> and <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> to <S%H7453>another<s%>, What <S%H376>man<s%> is he that will <S%H2490>begin<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> against the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%>? he shall be <S%H7218>head<s%> over all the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>.
